Class BaseInterface

java.lang.Object
Interface.BaseInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplicantInterface, ManagerInterface, OfficerInterface
public abstract class BaseInterface extends Object
Abstract base class for all user interface types (e.g., ApplicantInterface, OfficerInterface). Provides shared functionality such as filter management, input reading, password changing, and project filtering.

  • Method Details

    • readIntInput

      protected int readIntInput(String prompt)
      Reads an integer input from the user with validation.
      Parameters:
      prompt - the message to prompt the user
      Returns:
      the valid integer input

    • parseDate

      protected LocalDate parseDate(String prompt)
      Prompts the user for a date and parses it into a LocalDate. Expected format: yyyy/M/d
      Parameters:
      prompt - the prompt message
      Returns:
      the parsed LocalDate

    • start

      public abstract void start()
      Starts the user interface. Each subclass must implement its own interface logic.

    • setProjectService

      protected void setProjectService(IProjectService projectService)
      Sets the project service used for filtering and project operations.
      Parameters:
      projectService - the project service to set

    • changePassword

      protected boolean changePassword()
      Allows the user to change their password if the old password is verified.
      Returns:
      true if password change was successful, false otherwise

    • manageFilters

      protected void manageFilters()
      Provides a console menu to manage filters applied to project listings.

    • applyProjectFilters

      protected List<Project> applyProjectFilters(List<Project> projects)
      Applies the current set of filters to a list of projects using the project service.
      Parameters:
      projects - the original list of projects
      Returns:
      a filtered list of projects
